im.duk.cml.util

Class SkillFunc

  • java.lang.Object
    • im.duk.cml.util.SkillFunc

  • public class SkillFunc
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities class for cml/runescape functions. Mostly ported from the php version used by the site.
    Author:
    Andreas Holley, Oscar McCully

      • getVirtualLevel

        public static int getVirtualLevel(int xp)
        Get the virtual level of a skill, given the xp.
        Parameters:
        xp - the xp to calculate the virtual level from.
        Returns:
        the virtual level that you would be at given the xp.

      • getLevel

        public static int getLevel(int xp)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the calculated level.

      • timeToShortString

        public static java.lang.String timeToShortString(long time)
        Converts a duration (given in seconds) to a short string in the form '2d8h3m5s'.
        Parameters:
        time - the duration to convert, in seconds.
        Returns:
        the string representing the time.

      • getSkillName

        Get the name of a skill, given its index.
        Parameters:
        i - the index of the skill, from 0 to 23
        Returns:
        The name of the skill.
